title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck
title_original: PRETTYGARDEN Womens Long Sleeve Quarter Zip Pullover Sweater Casual Loose V Neck Collared Ribbed Knit Jumper Tops Thumb Hole

reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater well-made with a nice fit that falls just below the butt, and appreciate its soft material and true pale pink color. Customers praise its versatility, noting it can be dressed up for a night out or dressed down with leggings and tennis shoes.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater with good style and colors.
items.body: This is a great sweater with great styling and colors exactly as shown online. Sizing is just what the size chart indicates for product size. Really nice ribbing at bottom edge for a finished look. Medium weight fabric. Perfect for 40 degree northern CA winters. Good alone, with cotton t-neck underneath or under a heavier fleece. Stylish either open collar or zipped up for t-neck. Can be casual or dressy with accessories. I bought 4 of them in multiple colors and wear them all the time . Orange is a lovely burnt color as shown online. “Grey” is really a nice grey-blue exactly as shown online. Great buy. Read more
items.author: Santa Barbara shopper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice top!
items.body: This is a really nice quality top. Looks and feels more expensive than it is. Fits true to size. I got the M for the length. Could have taken the S (5’4”, 122) Great with leggings. The quarter zip is fashionable and makes the top more versatile. The color is true to the picture. I may order another. Definitely recommend. Read more
items.author: Amazon Addict

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely perfect!
items.body: Absolutely love!! I have the brown cinnamon color and the dark forest green. I get compliments on them all the time. Nice material! Washes wonderfully and dosnt shrink. Not too heavy, but great for layering too. Hits me right below waist as pictured. It’s a tad longer in the back which I love. Collar can lay down or stand up. Has a nice soft horizontal stripe to the material. I wear a large and it’s not too big. But you can wear a tank top or T-shirt underneath. Read more
items.author: nisa

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Purple Large Mismarked?
items.body: I have this top both in Army Green and Red. Both fit perfectly. It's a nice soft material, very comfortable. I ordered the purple (my favorite color), waited forever for it to be delivered. As soon as I opened the package I could tell it was much bigger than my other two. I measured the tops against one another and this purple was, at least, 3 inches wider all around. I even tried it on. It looked awful. I think it's an x-tra large that was mismarked as a large. Read more
items.author: YzWm

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5 star!
items.body: This top is excellent! I stayed tts in this. The material is so bouncy and soft. I can dress this up or down for a most casual look. Looks very classy- while also being comfortable! Read more
items.author: Daniel Wilson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Divine Fabric and Fit!
items.body: I have two of these amazing Quarter Zip Pullovers, Wine Red and Caramel with the exact same fit. They fit like a dream! I love the brilliance of the colors as well as the very flattering material. It glides over less-than-perfect issues. In fact, I hesitated to order a Medium as I am "busty", but this fabric is very forgiving, even making me look like I don't have a bit of a tummy. The cuffs of the sleeves are a bit longer than you usually see. They make the lower arms look slender when using the thumb hole. Or, you can push up the sleeve for a more casual look. The quarter zip has a very sturdy zipper, and the collar can stand straight up as well as lay down. This is one of the greatest clothing items I have ever purchased online. Guess I'll have to get that brilliant purple top after all. Read more
items.author: Robyn D. Shackelford

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and style! Love!
items.body: Love this top! Nice quality feel and beautiful terracotta color! Long enough to cover bum when wearing leggings and dressy with slacks! I’m 65, 5’4 and 160 and ordered the large. Will be ordering more colors! Order this and you won’t be disappointed! Read more
items.author: Smitty

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful top, love the fabric!
items.body: I love this top, the fabric is very soft, and just the right thickness to be warm outside, but comfortable indoors as well. The color is beautiful, and the sizing is perfect. The fit is loose, as I was hoping for, and it's long enough to wear with leggings. I'm looking forward to wearing it all winter! Read more
items.author: jogrissom

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Brown, Brown, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Orange, Dark Apricot, Dark Red, Dark Green, Red, Lake Blue, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
